title: Free Orpheus
content:
to betray Raphael and fights with you (Yugir is also a potential ally in Gather your Allies). Rapheal has 666 HP and is enhanced by the Soul Pillars. However, he has very low WIS so OTTO'S IRRESISTIBLE DANCE, Hold Monsters and Tasha's Hideous Laughter work great. Raphael turns into his devil form when he's 60% HP or lower, granting him more melee attacks. Defeat Rapheal rewards Gloves of Soul Catching and Helldusk Armor.

(How to open the portal to House of Hope)
